posts.post_content:
I am offering a low grade common T205 drum and T205 hindu for sale.  As many know these are pretty darn tough backs.

Hindu - PSA '1' - overall nice, very minor paperloss on front, clean back $525.
Drum - PSA '1' - presentable but minor damage to back - $725.

Please shoot me an email for scans if interested.

[url]scottglevy@yahoo.com[/url]
Scott, who's on the front of each?  If it's Herzog, I'm interested.  Thanks.
